thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Inchcape To Buy Automotive Distribution Business Grupo Rudelman For $284 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Inchcape To Buy Automotive Distribution Business Grupo Rudelman For $284 Mln
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Inchcape Plc:
* INCHCAPE PLC - ANNOUNCE ACQUISITION OF GRUPO RUDELMAN, AN AUTOMOTIVE DISTRIBUTION BUSINESS IN CENTRAL AMERICA FOCUSED ON SUZUKI
* INCHCAPE PLC - DEAL FOR A TOTAL CASH CONSIDERATION OF $284 MILLION ON A CASH-FREE AND DEBT-FREE BASIS.
* INCHCAPE PLC - DEAL ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS IN FIRST FULL YEAR POST-ACQUISITION BY MID-SINGLE DIGIT PERCENTAGE
* INCHCAPE PLC - DEAL FUNDED FROM EXISTING CASH AND COMMITTED DEBT FACILITIES
* INCHCAPE PLC - NO LONGER INTENDS TO CONTINUE WITH SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAMME WHICH WAS ANNOUNCED ON FEBRUARY 27 TH 2018. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
